attributes.action: Put in place legislation to prevent MEPs being compensated for loss of anything when the UK withdraws from the EU.
attributes.additional_details: MEPs have been on an immoral gravy train and they are there by choice - nobody forced them to put themselves up - so should not be compensated in any way when the UK votes to withdraw from the EU.  They should not even be allowed to have their furniture removals or cost of travel back from the continent (and especially NOT for any family members) paid for them when we withdraw.
